translations: 二重唱；二重奏；双人项目（duet 的复数）
唱二重唱；奏二重奏（duet 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: Ive never really thought about doing duets before and so far the situation has never arose.
sentences.translation: 之前我从没打算过要做二重唱，到目前为止也没有这种安排。

sentences.sentence: They defend their territories from other antbirds by singing complex duets to signal their combined strength.
sentences.translation: 它们通过复杂的鸣声二重奏来显示其合作的强大，以此捍卫领地不受其他蚁鸟的侵犯。
